shell. Drop a Composite under the CLabel so that a new row is created. Set the
layout of the Composite to GridLayout. Cut&Paste the CLabel into the Composite.
This will leave a filler inplace of the CLabel. Now select the Composite and
move it into the filler label. After doing this select the CLabel and NPE happens.

Apparently when the Composite is moved to another position, the container bean
proxy in the GridLayoutPolicyHelper is stale (probably a new Composite is
re-contstructed). I put an extra check in the getter method
(getContainerBeanProxy) to re-get the bean proxy if the proxy is invalid.
